title: Scooter sales growth surpasses that of bikes
description: Scooters are making a strong comeback in India, surpassing motorcycles in growth. Factors like electric mobility, urban congestion, and more women in the workforce have boosted scooter sales by 24% from April to August 2024. This marks a seven-year high in their market share.
